vouchers.VOUCHER_INFO_DESCRIPTION: Mollie lets you easily accept payments in your online shop using Eco-, gift- and meal vouchersâ€”a smart choice for boosting sales and satisfying your customers. The payment method "voucher" is only visible, if you have at least 1 product with an assigned voucher type in the cart.
vouchers.VOUCHER_INFO_DEFAULTLANGUAGE: Please note, this configuration can only be edited in your default language. Please change your language to modify the voucher type of this product.

mollie-subscription.title: Mollie Subscriptions
mollie-subscription.description: With Mollie subscriptions, you can easily create subscription products and schedule recurring payments to take place at the configured interval and period.
mollie-subscription.infoDefaultLanguage: Please note, this configuration can only be edited in your default language. Please change your language to modify the subscription settings of this product.
